item.description:
Another Thursday ramble into little known territory just south of Myles Standish. Our hikes have averaged two hours and three to four miles. Please bring water and snacks sufficient for about a two hour walk. Bug spray and sunscreen may also be required.

Easiest access for many would be from Head of the Bay Road near the Buzzards Bay Scenic Highway (Route 6) rotary. (A right onto Head of the Bay Road after the CVS and Mobil Station.) Head of the Bay for 1.4 miles to a right on Plymouth Lane which becomes Bourne Road (in Plymouth) after 0.9 miles (once you go under Route 25).

Hope that is clear enough. If not, please email me.
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot is reportedly just north of underpass with Route 25.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: 1000 Acres
